lessons.japanese: 環境汚染にいかに取り組むかは深刻な問題である。
lessons.indonesian: How to deal with environmental pollution is a serious matter.

lessons.japanese: 過去ではなく、未来に向けて取り組むのが当社の方針です。
lessons.indonesian: Our policy is to build for the future, not the past.

lessons.japanese: そろそろ本気で仕事に取り組むころだよ。
lessons.indonesian: It is time you get down to work.

lessons.japanese: 世界が一丸となって気候変動の問題に取り組む必要がある。
lessons.indonesian: The whole world needs to tackle the problem of climate change together.
